availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eli Mullins (Pendleton County, Kentucky, hotel keeper and postmaster)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, hotelkeeper and postmaster. Kentucky native. Mrried to Mary Carlisle. Father of William H. Mullins. Married to Delcina Mullins in Pendleton County, Kentucky, in July 1846. Father of Zachariah Mullins, William H. Mullins, Mary H. Mullins, and Enos Mullins. Hotelkeeper in Pendleton County in 1860. Postmaster of De Mossville, Kentucky, from June 20, 1861, to March 17, 1865.
